web_snippets: "IMPACT" is a film that tells the powerful story of two skydivers, Mark Lucchiari and Ben Lucock, and their journey to recovery after a near-fatal accident.
Mark Lucchiari. lucch. Adventurer | CEO @givengetorg | Mentor | Retired Athlete | Passionate about pushing limits & giving back| Featured in the @impact.movie ...
... Mark Lucchiari. But ... is a reminder: things can happen”. Lucch hanging out with his friends in a car park Photo courtesy of Mark Lucchiari.
